website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy, lightweight measuring wheel that makes getting an accurate measurement a breeze.
pros: Made of durable, yet lightweight aluminum
Stops spinning as soon as it's lifted
cons: There have been a few reports of the counter breaking or struggling to reset itself

customer_reviews.title: Light, compact, durable measuring wheel
customer_reviews.text: We have both the metric and imperial versions of this measuring wheel. We use the imperial wheel for rough measurements on our property. It's sturdy, light, and very conveniant for transport when compacted. The only complaint would be the wheel sometimes skips giving shorter readings when measuring on soil and grass. We use the metric version for work measuring distances between vehicles, and it has held up to a lot of use in the office. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good! I have used measuring wheels for 30 years ...
customer_reviews.text: Not good! I have used measuring wheels for 30 years on a weekly basis. The older Rolatape wheels were good products and would hold up for a 2-3 years until the counter would break. This wheel is a different story. The telescoping aluminum rod with cam type locking levers is a very poor design. Very quickly one of the lockers became so loose that the wheel would not stay on the ground under any pressure. I had to tape the joint, which renders the telescopic design useless. It is also very bulky and heavy compared to the older slim design. Another flawed "new" design just for the sake of being new, at much lower quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Ok for $$ but I'd prefer the Keson
customer_reviews.text: Rolls well, stand works and certainly more durable than Lufkin while less $$ than Keson. The scale however should be much easier to read. The numbers are so small for my 52yr old bespeckled eyes, I must lift unit much closer to my face just to get reading. Even at that, you must view from straight on to be legible. In retrospect, I should have spent the extra $$ and bought Keson w/it's big number counter. I'd also like a remote reset near handle but nobody seems to offer what would seem like a simple design.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Clasps don’t hold, and may just snap off because they are plastic crap!
customer_reviews.text: The counter seems to work fine, but I bought this one specifically because it collapses. The 2nd time I used it and pressed the clasps shut, once I expanded it the first clasp just snapped off, and the other onedoesn’t hold in a position so now I can’t collapse or use it unless I duct tape it all the way open. Garbage design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its working better than the ones we bought at Home Depot etc
customer_reviews.text: We have owned it for a year, its working better than the ones we bought at Home Depot etc, very smart design. Couple of screws came loose, easy to replace, couldn't be happier with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jas Singh

customer_reviews.title: Rolatape RT312 12-Inch Measuring Wheel
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a different manufacture's measuring wheel that broke. I'm glad I bought this one. The extending arm/shaft is very sturdy and strong compared to other units I have used that have either folding arms or similar extendible arm/shafts. The entire unit is light-weight and compact with the extension arm collapsed. The unit is very well made and should easily outlast other manufacture's measuring wheels.
customer_reviews.author: JDMcGII

customer_reviews.title: Measures in feet and inches not tenths.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, works fantastic and packs up nicely. Just wanted to mention this measures in feet and inches not tenths. We bought it as an engineering and surveying roll tape so it's a little different but not a huge deal. It was a little weird the first time someone used it and they wrote down 9.11-feet, and were temporarily dumbfounded.
customer_reviews.author: John Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Last measuring wheel you'll ever need
customer_reviews.text: There's no substitution for quality. I wasted money on smaller, cheaper devices that eventually failed when for a few dollars more I could have had this. The mechanical counter is time tested to last. The large wheel keeps the counter up and away from dirt and dust that plagued my smaller units and the well designed kickstand works extremely well. I'm certain I'll never need to replace this measuring device.
customer_reviews.author: D. Newton

customer_reviews.title: Good tool
customer_reviews.text: It's compact and does something my old Rolatape didn't do. When it rolls backwards, it measures back. If you roll too far, just roll it backwards to where it's supposed to be. My old one didn't measure to the nearest inch either, so that's another plus for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Solid measuring wheel.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good solid measuring wheel. I have found it to be accurate and it is sturdy. I have had others in the past that fold therefore creating a weak point in the handle. Those have never lasted very long. If your in the market for a measuring wheel I would get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dill Pickle

customer_reviews.title: Really good!
customer_reviews.text: I've used rolatape for nearly 30 years. This handle design is the best by far! Kick stand is much better too! The re-set button still has an issue with not re-setting to zero every time... that's been a frustration since they were made by the rolatape corporation in Spokane, Washington. Seems like it would be an easy fix. That's the only thing that keeps me from giving it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: The Inspector

customer_reviews.title: Like it, works great
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a good measuring wheel for use when I go shooting, and this thing seems to be very accurate and is easy to use! Good buy! So far I have only measured out to 175-200' and am sure it would work great up to the 9999.9' which is what the max is! Fold op nicely, is light weight and the box/packaging it came with is great for storage/transportation too!
customer_reviews.author: S. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Good Job
customer_reviews.text: Was for a gift for Son-in-law, who works with a Sheriff's dept. Tested it against a tape and said it appeared to be rather accurate, which is needed for accident reconstruction. The fact that it collapses inside itself and, has a kickstand should help him in his job rather well. Says it's just what he needed.
customer_reviews.author: Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Was pleasantly surprised when I got it (in a good way).
customer_reviews.text: expected something smaller and with less quality. Was pleasantly surprised when I got it (in a good way).
customer_reviews.author: Elsie Lodde

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: This measuring wheel works perfectly and is built from quality construction. I've used it several times since receiving it on various construction sites, including gravel, mud and concrete. It works very well under all circumstances. The digital measuring device is very accurate. I need very accurate measurements, so I double checked several measurements with a good ol fashioned measuring tape. I would definitely recommend this product, it's half the price of the Home Depot and Lowes measuring wheels and built better.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Latch broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: The latch for extending the handle broke on the very first use. Fortunately, that doesn't affect its function, just its portability/ease of storage. The wheel seems to work well over rough terrain and long grass, and the roll-backwards-to-count-down is a very nice feature. Still, I do have to wonder about the longevity of other parts if the latch is that flimsy. Very disappointed- I shelled out the extra dough for what I thought would be a better model. Even the cheap Harbor Freight wheel lasted two outings...
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: First unit failed within 2 months  I am on my second unit and I believe that my second unit still has a 5 year warantee.
customer_reviews.text: first rolatape RT312 12 in measuring wheel failed within 2 months. An internal failure within the yellow box resulted in a ticking and no measurement. I sent it back to Amazon and they sent me another. I am currently using the replacement. Hopefully it will last longer than the first. Keep in mine that this product has a 5 year warrantee. Replacement unit failed within 2 months and Amazon will no longer allow me to return it. Same failure, drive gear will not engage when wheel is turned. Piece of S***
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Svee

customer_reviews.title: but also collapses nicely for storage
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality for the price. Appears to be a solid aluminum or other metal "mag" wheel. Aluminum shaft is solid, but also collapses nicely for storage. I used this to measure out a 2-mile Army running course on a roadway with ease and confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed product
customer_reviews.text: After using wheel 6 times the gears must of stripped. Called customer service and was told to send it (my cost $20.00) to the service center. This product is JUNK. BTW, the wheel was only used on blacktop or concrete surfaces..
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works as should ordered a second one for other truck
customer_reviews.author: Leona truesdale

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for the most part. Easier to drag than push over long distances and at speeds. Be careful it does not wiggle as you move it. Parking stand is a distinct convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Rocket Scientist

customer_reviews.title: Good tape for the price
customer_reviews.text: Durable with a bright color that makes it easier to find in your truck. A lot of competitor tapes are flimsy and the reset button for the numbers are junky. Rolatape has a quality built product that will last a long time in the field, as long as it is cared for.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good choice at this price point
customer_reviews.text: I use this a couple times a week at work and for a pretty cheap product, it's decently robust and very functional. I agree with others who say the actual counter is the potential weak spot, but mine is working well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan M.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be of high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Used this in a factory environment to measure out cable runs. Seems to be of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty aluminium shaft. Folds down to save space. I keep it in one of my side boxes and it takes minimum space. Very solid wheel. Very well made. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ruhltech Services Inc. llc

customer_reviews.title: Works well...
customer_reviews.text: Works great ! Used in in 6" tall grass field... no issues... Compact storage... light weight... accurate for my needs... records going forward & backward... Well built... the counter mechanism seems not as well built as the rest...
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T.

customer_reviews.title: Works for this military unit
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to mark off two-mile stretches of running lanes in an urban area. This works fine, it's simple, and shows us ecatly what we need to know. It' not unwieldy, and it's simple to use. That meets out needs.
customer_reviews.author: Our Big Active Family

customer_reviews.title: Great product for measuring long outdoor distances
customer_reviews.text: I had a 2000+ foot driveway that I needed to measure and it worked perfectly. The large wheel made it easy to use in rocky areas and even across a shallow ditch. I am so glad I went with this model and not some of the others I considered. Seems to be pretty durable and I expect many years of homeowner use.
customer_reviews.author: Kilowatt

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: This measuring wheel is basic, no fancy LED display or any other modern add ons. With that said, that's the way it should be, feels well built and works perfectly for my needs on solid pavementent to loose gravel. This shoul lst a lifetime
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good wheel
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. For a relatively inexpensive wheel it works well. I use it for my profession almost daily and it has held up well and is still counting.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I really haven't used it much, but when I ...
customer_reviews.text: I really haven't used it much, but when I was playing with it, it seemed to do what I needed. Really just using it to estimate fence length.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Measuring wheel
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking product. Price was much better for same exact product from other websites. I wanted a measuring wheel to help layout of farm outbuildings & to help figure square footage in different yards to figure weed control needs & also grass seed needs. Telescoping handle is dandy too. Large wheel goes over rough ground of yard very easily. Calibration counter works well & is easy to read while walking along w/o stopping.
customer_reviews.author: ericalieff

customer_reviews.title: Even better than i expected
customer_reviews.text: Measures fine, the weight and ergonomics are perfect. I love the height control and the kickstand works very well. Yes, yes, YES!
customer_reviews.author: Ted Chmielewski

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the Rolatape. I have a large property and needed to measure for crossfencing. Large wheel covered the ground effortlessly, easy to use, read and is very sturdy. The kickstand is a real bonus. Great bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: Rick dishong

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Among other things, I provide valuations for my company's clients, a job I picked up when someone moved away. This does everything as advertised, is of good quality and would recommend the seller to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: john reaves

customer_reviews.title: Works well...
customer_reviews.text: Works well and saves about $9 compared to the one in Home Depot. Pretty accurate and really speeds up estimates... can't believe I didn't get one sooner. Sometimes the counter gets stuck and needs the reset hit a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: ... PROPERTY WORKS FOR WHAT I BOUGHT IT FOR AND HAPPY WITH THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: JUST NEEDED ONE TO SURVEY MY PROPERTY WORKS FOR WHAT I BOUGHT IT FOR AND HAPPY WITH THE PRICE!
customer_reviews.author: ben hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Seems very accurate. Used it at work to find out how many laps I needed to do between floors to go one mile. Plus, I live on 1 1/2 acres and I got tired of running really long tape measures on the property.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Solid Measuring Wheel
customer_reviews.text: I use this product frequently in the field and can say that it has held up well in most conditions. It is most suitable for flat smooth surfaces as it's bounces on anything rougher due to its lighter weight.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Lefty

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy wheel style Rolatape
customer_reviews.text: Like this one much better than the old one I had. The locking, square telescope style handle is much more beefy and sturdy than the round aluminum tube style. The folding type was not as sturdy going over rougher surfaces. When not being used, the telescope style compresses down and is less cumbersome too. Very happy and should last much longer than my other one!
customer_reviews.author: 2001sapphire

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and functional
customer_reviews.text: Used to measure sites for landscape design. This tool makes life so much easier. Double checked accuracy by running it alongside a 35ft tape measure and it was spot on every time. Kickstand is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Q-360

customer_reviews.title: Wow really built very well!
customer_reviews.text: Item is first class! Built very well and love the extension handle. This item is very sturdy, and the large wheel is a plus for any surface. Would recommend to anyone looking!
customer_reviews.author: Savy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Met every expectation. Used once so far to measure POA roads. Very accurate--compared to known distance-- off by maybe an inch in about 100 ft. Measures well on rough asphalt/gravel surfaces. Mechanical counter far superior to electronic counters on other models (e.g. won't automatically shut off in the midst of measuring). You do have to be careful on resets. Often takes two "presses" to get all the dials way back to zero and lined up..
customer_reviews.author: Jim McCormack

customer_reviews.title: Quality was good and we are happy with our purchase
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time as promised. Quality was good and we are happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Farsai

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry!
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat item. It's easy to fit in the trunk of my car. Easy to roll about and it makes my job much more accurate and easy when quoting on phone wiring and data cable installations.
customer_reviews.author: GRW

customer_reviews.title: Very well made. Quality product
customer_reviews.text: This measuring wheel works great and it's very sturdy and well made. Wheel seems to be some type of cast metal and plastic handle and measuring box are rigid sturdy plastic.
customer_reviews.author: CHarris

customer_reviews.title: Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: Much heavier construction than my old rolling wheel. I like the rest as it works well and the fact it cuts the measurement back when the wheel rolls backwards.
customer_reviews.author: Dave G

customer_reviews.title: ... all the time for construction purposes and it's worked great every time
customer_reviews.text: I use this over rough ground all the time for construction purposes and it's worked great every time.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Stimmel

customer_reviews.title: The swivel locks for the extending handle are much better than what I found at Lowes and Home Depot
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised. The swivel locks for the extending handle are much better than what I found at Lowes and Home Depot. The cost, even with shipping, was less than the two stores mentioned above.
customer_reviews.author: Robert DeLauney

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great even in deep grass and brush. We measured out our future house plans, even marking each room. It is surprisingly accurate and being able to reverse is great.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Rolatape RT312
customer_reviews.text: The Rolatape RT312 Measuring Wheel is one of the best wheels I have ever used. I work for a construction company and we use wheels daily. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Yasser Khalil

customer_reviews.title: Rolatape assisted greatly on renovation project.
customer_reviews.text: The Rolatape worked extremely well when measuring our warehouse and parking lot. This will be used many times over the coming year
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Role
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Worked right out of the box!!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Bluemmel

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I use it for measuring houses for insurance. Previously used the small wheel types that kept on breaking due to sand and dirt getting in them. With the large wheel it doesn't seem that it will foul as easily. I also like the way the shaft locks.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the item! Good quality very accurate and easy to use. I would buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Bitwave

customer_reviews.title: Descent
customer_reviews.text: Fairly descent measuring wheel. I don't care for the telescoping handle but it works fine. I just prefer a folding handle. Measures accurately and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby C. Mcfarland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great, saves lots of time over a rag tape. Quick and simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Weiher

customer_reviews.title: So Mobile, So Simple
customer_reviews.text: I love the portability of this easy to use measuring device. It telescopes to its measuring configuration in a few seconds. Digital read out with big numbers and push button reset to zero. What more would someone want.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Payne

customer_reviews.title: Well made, does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike about this wheel, haven't put it through heavy use yet though. Like that the counter backs up if the wheel is rolled backwards.
customer_reviews.author: DIYFAB

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected!
customer_reviews.text: The wheel is made of metal, and overall this product is perfect. We used it for an event setup for measuring booth sizes, nothing too crazy and it works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mr BIG EURO

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I can rate this product in 3 words: Smooth, quite, and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: cp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Use it just for measuring garden rows and different things.
customer_reviews.author: D.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Wheel for the Price
customer_reviews.text: So far, a great wheel for the price. Like any other, you cannot run with it on rough terrain in order to maintain accuracy. Is well built, and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Rhinin

customer_reviews.title: Working Great
customer_reviews.text: It is large enough to maneuver bumpy terrain and has proven to be accurate. The kick stand raises and lowers easily.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen O Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is you have to be mindful when you are pressing the measurement reset button. Sometimes it doesn't clear properly and it might need a second press. Overall, it is an "okay" product and you should consider other options.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Measuring Wheel
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good measuring wheel. I just never use it.
customer_reviews.author: My Friend Billie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DEAL
customer_reviews.text: No batteries required!!. Good old fashioned technology . The price was excellent ,it was promptly delivered and the quality is better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: L. John P

customer_reviews.title: WheelMan
customer_reviews.text: Great Wheel for the money! Nice handle extension. Good quality wheel that I have used on the job site several times!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a few times , but it has a sturdy feeling mechanism and the size of the wheel makes going over rough ground easy.
customer_reviews.author: b.tidwell

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with my choice, would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Only used a few times, but seems very rugged and is easy to read, Rolls nicely even in thick grass
customer_reviews.author: K Gipe

customer_reviews.title: Nice measuring wheel for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Not the nicest one out there but it functions very well and is definitely a good value. The quality of the bracket for the stand is not very good and I see it breaking in the future, but again, it's a really good measuring wheel in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item to always have for multiple projects. Worked well when installing sprinkler and year drainage pipe.
customer_reviews.author: atmdsm

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Only disillusion I need it in meters not feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does an adequate jun
customer_reviews.text: This measuring wheel does an adequate. I wish that I had spent a bit more money so that the distance could be reset at the handle rather than bending over and resetting.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Winters

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: This is a big time saver. In my line of work can get the job done faster with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Yanta

customer_reviews.title: and found it to be superior to what we had been using
customer_reviews.text: Tried the product as we had been using another, and found it to be superior to what we had been using. Have continued to order the product and keep it in stock for our field personnel.
customer_reviews.author: S Hartzell

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I've used it several times works great would buy more if I need it
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: 12" Measuring Wheel
customer_reviews.text: This wheel was defiantly the correct wheel for me!! It really works great!! I have used it a lot with no problems at all, Will buy another one if needed !!
customer_reviews.author: Olen Miller

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use measuring wheel. Numbers are large enough to see while standing up. Like the telescoping pole.
customer_reviews.author: Diane T Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This item fits my needs perfectly. It is more accurate than my previous measuring wheel. I'm not doing measurements much bigger than maybe a couple hundred feet, but for my needs, this item is great. The telescoping pole is easy to use, and seems pretty durable, also the kickstand is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: dwanna

customer_reviews.title: Nice product and hassle free returns
customer_reviews.text: First one I received was defective but it was free to return and exchange for another one. Very smooth and hassle free exchange and did not have to pay for return shipping. New one is working well so far.
customer_reviews.author: N8DOGGS HOGS

customer_reviews.title: Is what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Used messaging new property. Worked good going up and down hills. Is what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I researched for both quality and price before I decided on this tool. I find it to be very effective in measuring both indoors and out. The fold up kick stand is great and the telescoping handle is great also, it works much like a camera tripod stand. It exceeded my expectations after some other negative reviews. People need to remember that nearly everything is mass produced and there will be faulty items made. More people like to gripe than praise. Over all a fine product.
customer_reviews.author: alee*

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had mine for over a year and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The measure wheel is great and very simple to use. No need to worry about putting it together when it arrives. The wheel comes pre-assembled.
customer_reviews.author: IG

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Numbers stopped working almost an hour into getting it
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: My first use of a roller
customer_reviews.text: This product does what it is supposed to. I like the attached stand and it measures extremely well. The wheel rolled well across wet ground on its first use. I bought it for use with my painting company, Fresh Coat Painters (of Allen TX). Darrell [...]
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, I have used the device a few times in my job as a building inspector. I really like the grip handle and the stand. Very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Brigham

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Solid product. Does exactly what I need it to do. I would recommend it for any surveyors like myself who need measurements all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Merritt

customer_reviews.title: so far so good wish was a bit longer on handle and im ...
customer_reviews.text: so far so good wish was a bit longer on handle and im only 5ft 9 inches do fence estimates all day and im happy so far
customer_reviews.author: john oneill

customer_reviews.title: Better than a roll tape.
customer_reviews.text: Durable construction. Easy to use. Good product. Definitely better than a roll tape for measuring long distances. I would buy this product again for personal use.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Why ?
customer_reviews.text: If you do any kind of measuring you need to get one of theese.It is so easy to use,I just wish I had bought one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Lutonsky

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Usually a great product, but mine broke after 2 months of moderate use. Manufacturer is sending a new "ticker" free of charge.
customer_reviews.author: aubreighparks

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I needed this to measure lengths of trails that I build on property and it works great and is accurate
customer_reviews.author: Rob Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Used by  police acAdemy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the cost. Used to train traffic investigation for police academy
customer_reviews.author: WESLEY ARMSTRONG

customer_reviews.title: Not tough enough.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice idea that doesn't work well in practice. Less than 6 months of only moderate usage and the kickstand is already broken and the counter reset isn't working as well as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Why miss lead people ?
customer_reviews.text: Well I was in a jam and orderd this one cause the company I work for require a 12 inch wheel this is not a 12 inch wheel as in the description. It is 12.5 Not very happy at the moment
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Does job
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Just walk and measure. Remember it only goes to 10000 feet and then reset to continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Hiker guy

customer_reviews.title: Measures accurately and easy to push
customer_reviews.text: The 12" rollatape was easy to use from the start. Intutive, light weight and easy to handle. I used it to measure the distance I walked in the Ilahee perserve and was astounded to find that I walking between 3.5 and 4.2 miles. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: cman

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Use for Hwy construction. Works great, folds small, very accurate, and reliable. would recomend to others considering. beats the Kesson ones that we previously purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hribar
